trans-unit.source: Enumerates the values of <see langword="EmphasisWord" /> for a specific <see langword="TextFragment" />.
trans-unit.target: Enumera los valores de <see langword="EmphasisWord" /> para un <see langword="TextFragment" /> concreto.

trans-unit.source: The word emphasis is set for <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instances through the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A> property on the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> object returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> property on an instance of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>.
trans-unit.target: El énfasis de word está establecido para <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instancias a través de la <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A> propiedad en el <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> objeto devuelto por la <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> propiedad en una instancia de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>.

trans-unit.source: Each synthetic speech engine is free to determine how to render emphasis; the nature of emphasis differs between languages, dialects, genders, or voices.
trans-unit.target: Cada motor de síntesis de voz es gratuito determinar cómo representar énfasis; la naturaleza de énfasis difiere entre idiomas, dialectos, géneros o las voces.

trans-unit.source: Both <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisWord> and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisBreak> may be used when setting or getting the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A> on a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> instance.
trans-unit.target: Ambos <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisWord> y <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisBreak> puede utilizarse al establecer u obtener el <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A> en un <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> instancia.

trans-unit.source: The two values may be distinguished by the fact that the actual values of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisWord> are greater than or equal to zero, and the values of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisBreak> are all less than zero; and by using the value of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A> property on the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> object returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> property on an instance.
trans-unit.target: Los dos valores se pueden distinguir por el hecho de que los valores reales del <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisWord> son mayores o iguales a cero y los valores de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisBreak> todos los menores que cero; y con el valor de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> devuelto por la <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A> propiedad en el <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> objeto devuelto por la <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> propiedad en una instancia.

trans-unit.source: Indicates an engine-specific default level of emphasis.
trans-unit.target: Indica un nivel de énfasis predeterminado específico del motor.
Indica que no hay ningún énfasis especificado.
